text: Re-Animator (also called H. P. Lovecraft's Re-Animator) is a 1985 American comedy horror movie directed by Stuart Gordon and produced by Brian Yuzna, the film stars Jeffrey Combs as Herbert West.Stephen Jones. The Essential Monster Movie Guide. Billboard Books. 2000. Pg. 313 == References == == Other websites == *Official Website *Re-Animator on IMDb *Re-Animator on Allmovie Category:Comedy horror movies
